channel.title: Adding vote4cash 639 rsps

item.title: Adding vote4cash 639 rsps
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

So far i have this code in actionsender.java

if(player.checkVote(player.getUsername())) { player.getInventory().addItem(995, 10000000); player.sendMessage("Thanks for voting!"); }
public boolean checkVote(String username) { try { URL url = new URL("http://www.zarconia.com/vote.php?type=checkvote&username="+username+""); BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream())); String result = reader.readLine(); if(result.equalsIgnoreCase("true")) { return true; } else { return false; } } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return false; }
When i compile, i get..
src\org\dementhium\net\ActionSender.java:800: error: cannot find symbol if(player.checkVote(player.getUsername())) { ^ symbol: method checkVote(String) location: variable player of type Player 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
